testcase.name: validate

failure.message:
Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: object has missing required properties (["codework","job"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"#","pointer":""} instance: {"pointer":""} domain: "validation" keyword: "required" required: ["codework","email","firstName","job","lastName","skills"] missing: ["codework","job"]
but: was "{
 "firstName": "Naani",
 "lastName": "Charan",
 "email": "nanicharan@gmail.com",
 "skills":["Watering Plants","Taking Photos"]
 }"
